attributes.action: instruct H M Revenue and Customs, in view of the difficulties caused by the current severe weather, to extend the time limit for submission of Self Assessment returns for the year ended 5 April 2009 from 31 January 2010 to 28 February 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many sole practitioners and small firms of accountants are experiencing unexpected disruption to their work schedules because of the difficulty of staff accessing their offices and clients attending with their records.  As the Meteorological Office did not predict a severe winter, small firms are likely not to have made contingency plans, and their clients will in consequence be penalised for failings of 'the system,' not of themselves if the time limit remains 31 January.
